ygData.subject: Re: Telescope and Collapsable Fishing Pole
ygData.msgSnippet: This is what we ve been waiting for! People, we must renew efforts! We must try harder to discory the methods used to make these items. I myself would except:
ygData.messageBody:
This is what we've been waiting for! People, we must renew efforts! We must
try harder to discory the methods used to make these items. I myself would
except: A I'm not level 16. B I'm almost always broke now, anyway. But when
I get more money I'll start working on it.
Now we know that there are more items. Just keep trying....or maybe we could
just bribe that guy....hmmm....

>Hiya guys,
>
>Well, I have good news and bad news. The good news is the Telescope Lens
>and Collapsable Fishing Pole CAN be made. And, you DO have to use a
>collapsable fishing pole to make the telescope. Both of these items are
>makeable.
>
>Now for the bad news. The only person I know that can make them WILL NOT
>share the recipe! Can you believe that? He is a gnome on Xegony by the
>name of Salvadori, so if you can pry the recipe from him, good luck. I
>tried. Well, also, he said that Tinkering skill improvement had been
>fixed, and he was up in the 60's on skill. So keep tinkering.
>
>Xalastile
>Level 22 Magician
>Xegony
